Question: The historian Gordon S Wood argues that this person's political philosophy was a product of his time and his scientific interests.
Hints: Instead of retreating, this person sent federal agents to secretly track down smugglers and violators.
In 1807, this person ordered his former vice president Aaron Burr tried for treason.
Shortly before leaving office, in March 1809, this person signed the repeal of the disastrous Embargo.
